on reading compounds: 非常勤【ヒジョウキン】part-time work
勤行時報係【ゴンギョウジホウガカリ】muezzin
kun reading compounds: 勤める【つとめる】to work (for), to be employed (at), to serve (in), to serve (as), to act (as), to fill (the position of), to play the role (of), to conduct a religious service
勤まる【つとまる】to be fit for, to be equal to, to function properly
勤しむ【いそしむ】to work hard at, to devote oneself to, to be diligent in
